ygData.subject: Re:  RE: [EQ-Quest] Kunark = QUESTS!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I have only a newly created Iksar Warrior.  When I turned in my guild note, I received a pike which is a pretty cool weapon and can be stored in my back
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I have only a newly created Iksar Warrior. When I turned in my
guild note, I received a pike which is a pretty cool weapon and can
be stored in my back slot. Also I can upgrade this weapon through a
series of quests (similar to the monk headband quests).

I like to practice a number of trade skills and immediately noticed
many new items, like 6 new pies, at the local vendor. There is no
recipe book, so I expect that there is a quest to find the recipes
but I am not sure.

I have not carried my higher level characters over yet because I have
been too busy playing my lizard (my all time favorite race). I have
heard of a number of new and interesting items and quests, but
nothing I can speak of directly as I haven't enough information.

Here is a link listing a number of the quests thus far...

http://www.eqatlas.com/kunark/questguide.html
